decolorization result: visible color change from blue to violet
any additional information: Prolonged incubation showed reduced ability to decolorize at 30 µg/ml.

type of dye: combined triphenylmethane dyes (crystal violet + brilliant green + basic fuchsin + malachite green)
combined dyes (crystal violet, orange II, biebrich scarlet)

type of fungi: clone SQ1AM1 (R. erythropolis SQ1 with pAM1)
